  50. ‌struct ngx_log_s {
  51.     ngx_uint_t           log_level;
  52.     ngx_open_file_t     *file;

  54.     ngx_atomic_uint_t    connection;

  56.     time_t               disk_full_time;

  58.     ngx_log_handler_pt   handler;
  59.     void                *data;

  61.     ngx_log_writer_pt    writer;
  62.     void                *wdata;

  64.     /*
  65.      * we declare "action" as "char *" because the actions are usually
  66.      * the static strings and in the "u_char *" case we have to override
  67.      * their types all the time
  68.      */

  70.     char                *action;

  72.     ngx_log_t           *next;
  73. };

  87. ‌#define ngx_log_error(level, log, ...)                                        \
  88.     if ((log)->log_level >= level) ngx_log_error_core(level, log, __VA_ARGS__)

  90. void ngx_log_error_core(ngx_uint_t level, ngx_log_t *log, ngx_err_t err,
  91.     const char *fmt, ...);

  93. ‌#define ngx_log_debug(level, log, ...)                                        \

  95.         ngx_log_error_core(NGX_LOG_DEBUG, log, __VA_ARGS__)

  97. /*********************************/

  99. #elif (NGX_HAVE_GCC_VARIADIC_MACROS)

  101. ‌#define NGX_HAVE_VARIADIC_MACROS  1

  103. ‌#define ngx_log_error(level, log, args...)                                    \

  106. void ngx_log_error_core(ngx_uint_t level, ngx_log_t *log, ngx_err_t err,
  107.     const char *fmt, ...);

  109. ‌#define ngx_log_debug(level, log, args...)                                    \
  110.     if ((log)->log_level & level)                                             \
  111.         ngx_log_error_core(NGX_LOG_DEBUG, log, args)

  113. /*********************************/

  117. ‌#define NGX_HAVE_VARIADIC_MACROS  0

  119. void ngx_cdecl ngx_log_error(ngx_uint_t level, ngx_log_t *log, ngx_err_t err,

  243. /*
  244. * ngx_write_stderr() cannot be implemented as macro, since
  245. * MSVC does not allow to use #ifdef inside macro parameters.
  246. *
  247. * ngx_write_fd() is used instead of ngx_write_console(), since
  248. * CharToOemBuff() inside ngx_write_console() cannot be used with
  249. * read only buffer as destination and CharToOemBuff() is not needed
  250. * for ngx_write_stderr() anyway.
  251. */
  252. static ngx_inline void
  253. ‌ngx_write_stderr(char *text)
  254. {
  255.     (void) ngx_write_fd(ngx_stderr, text, ngx_strlen(text));
  256. }


  259. static ngx_inline void
  260. ‌ngx_write_stdout(char *text)
  261. {
  262.     (void) ngx_write_fd(ngx_stdout, text, ngx_strlen(text));
  263. }


  266. extern ngx_module_t  ngx_errlog_module;
  267. extern ngx_uint_t    ngx_use_stderr;


  270. #endif /* _NGX_LOG_H_INCLUDED_ */
